com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.read

Class FileTableReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.read.AbstractTableReader
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.read.AbstractSubTableReader
        • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.read.FileTableReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubTableReader, TableReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbfTableReader, ExcelTableReader, TextFileTableReader

    public abstract class FileTableReader
extends AbstractSubTableReader
    The FileTableReader class provides a simple TableReader implementation for use when data tables are to be read from files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTableReader

        public FileTableReader(java.lang.String tableFilePath,
               java.lang.String tableName)
        Constructor specifying the file and table name for the table data.
        Parameters:
        tableFilePath - The path to the table data file.
        tableName - The name to use for the table.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if tableFilePath was not found.

      • FileTableReader

        public FileTableReader(java.lang.String tableFilePath)
        Constructor specifying the file the table data. The file name (excluding directories) will be used as the table name.
        Parameters:
        tableFilePath - The path to the table data file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if tableFilePath was not found.
